# Weles
> Collection of various pattern recognition methods and experimental tools made by Machine Learning Group of Wroc≈Çaw University of Science and Technology

## Current contents

- classifiers
  - `ExposerClassifier`
  - `LinearClassifier`
  - `SSGNB`
- ensemble
  - `Cluens`
  - `Geometron`
  - `GES`
  - `NURS`
  - `RandomSubspace`
  - `UMCE`
- meta
  - `PCASSE`
- optimizers
  - `RAO`
- tests
  - `t_test_corrected`
  - `t_test_13`
  - `t_test_rel`
